text: Kanchipuram is one of the seven most holy cities of Hindus. It is about southwest of Chennai, Tamil Nadu state, India. Kanchipuram was an important religious and cultural place of Ancient India. The city continues to be an important religious place. For a long time, from the 6th century till the 8th century, the city was capital city of the Pallava dynasty. There are many temples in the city. There is a Math (religious centre) of Shankaracharya in this city. Kanchipuram silk sarees are famous Category:Kanchipuram district Category:Cities in Tamil Nadu
